Title: Harry Potter
Description: Harry Potter is an orphaned boy brought up by his unkind Muggle (non-magical) aunt and uncle. At the age of eleven, half-giant Rubeus Hagrid informs him that he is actually a wizard and that his parents were murdered by an evil wizard named Lord Voldemort.

Genre.Name: fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy by definition, fantasy is a genre that typically features the use of magic or other supernatural phenomena in the plot, setting, or theme. Magical or mythological creatures often feature, as well as races other than humans, such as elves, dwarves, or goblins.

Director.Name: Chris Columbus
Director.Bio: Chris Columbus is an American filmmaker

Title: The Lord of The Rings
Description: The Lord of the Rings is the saga of a group of sometimes reluctant heroes who set forth to save their world from consummate evil. Its many worlds and creatures were drawn from Tolkien's extensive knowledge of philology and folklore.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy by definition, fantasy is a genre that typically features the use of magic or other supernatural phenomena in the plot, setting, or theme. Magical or mythological creatures often feature, as well as races other than humans, such as elves, dwarves, or goblins.

Director.Name: Peter Jackson
Director.Bio: Peter Jackson is New Zealand director, perhaps best known for his film adaptations of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: A gang of criminals robs a Gotham City mob bank; the Joker manipulates them into murdering each other for a higher share until only he remains and escapes with the money. Batman, District Attorney Harvey Dent and Lieutenant Jim Gordon form an alliance to rid Gotham of organized crime.

Genre.Name: Superhero Film
Genre.Description: A superhero film or superhero movie is a film that focuses on the actions of superheroes: individuals who usually possess extraordinary generally superhuman abilities, and are dedicated to protecting the public..

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Nolan is a British-American film director, producer, and screenwriter.
